column4: can i use ubuntu grum without having ubuntu install and choose to boot opnesuse or windows?

can i use ubuntu grub without having ubuntu install and choose to boot opnesuse or windows? right now i think i have ubuntu grub installed but it loads opensuse grb and doesn't boot up windows properly (windows freeze)
yes.  But if you're already at something windows related when it freezes, it's not GRUB, because you've already passed control to windows at that point
slabbeh: No.  It'll be released within the next 26 hours.  Check out #ubuntu-release-party for updates/questions/etc
